title: How to transfer server?
body:
Hi, I will leave NZ next year so wanna transfer my account to Japanese Server, but I dont know how to do it, and also I didnt find anything that I can purchase in the game's store that can do it for me.
Anyone have some idea 'bout it? Cheers. :)

replies.body: Are you using the old or new client? Because account transfers are currently unavailable in the new client.
